name: Pompaze
description:
• Help our protagonist to find the exit from different mazes.
  • Use the power of five medallions to help you out in your victory.
  • Evade multiple volcanic rocks that will search your destruction.
  • Every level has 3 different mazes.  Many of the elements are randomly located.
  • Every time you die you will face another of the 3 mazes, sometimes in an inverse direction.

CONTROLS:

W to move forward
A to move to the left
D to move to the right
S to move downward
ESC to pause the game
